Title: Prohibits contracts for the purchase or financing of a dog, cat, or rabbit from including provisions allowing repossession of the animal
Summary: Prohibits contracts for the purchase or financing of a dog, cat, or rabbit from including provisions allowing repossession of the animal; provides that such provisions apply to the sale of dogs, cats and rabbits through an online website.
LawCode: Amd ยง753-e, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting contracts for the purchase or financing of a dog, cat, or rabbit from including provisions allowing repossession of the animal
